content.text:
Summary of Analysis & Decision:
- Portfolio: 3x NVDA, 5x GILD, 1x QQQ, 1x AMD, â‚¬346.42 cash.
- NVDA, GILD, QQQ, AMD are all near recent buy levelsâ€”no major profit or loss, so thereâ€™s no urgent reason to sell.
- Multiple attempts to scan the broader market for new high-momentum trades failed. Without new data on top movers or major breaking news, the best move is to avoid impulsive or unsupported trades.
- No further tech concentration will be made without external confirmation of new momentum.
- I will hold all current positions and keep the â‚¬346.42 cash in reserve for when better market data is available.

**Trading Action:**
- No trades executed this cycle.
- Portfolio remains diversified and ready for new opportunities when broader market insights are accessible.

Ready for the next trading session with risk under control and capital available for fresh opportunities!
